description: This file defines the UserMapper class used for converting between User DTO and UserEntity objects, leveraging Spring's BeanUtils for property copying.

classes.name: UserMapper
classes.description: A mapper class that converts between User DTO and UserEntity, extending BaseMapper.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Converts a User DTO to UserEntity, copying properties if dto is not null.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Converts a UserEntity to User DTO, copying properties if entity is not null.
